ul.li: The two languages Azerbaijani(Latin) and Welsh are added to the list of supported languages (see )

In both, the Plugin Manager Settings and the Auto Version Upgrade Settings, the Check Frequency Setting has been changed from Check for updates manually into Check for updates once per month. This is to ensure that users are informed bout new plugins or new versions of OpenTM2 at least once per month. See and .
